__e: You two are so like a married couple sometimes. Uh, gross!

Yeah, tell me about it. Those 48 hours alone were way too long.
OH NO, WE NEVER... THANK GOD, YOU JUST DON'T LOOK RIGHT TOGETHER.

You guys sound just like me and my dad.
